name: test_e2e_with_logs[036_SQLI_TIME_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_002` |
| **Name** | MySQL BENCHMARK function |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `BENCHMARK(1000000,MD5('test'))`
- **Encoded**: `BENCHMARK%281000000%2CMD5%28%27test%27%29%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~50000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:15:56.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_002-1767402956271-mwk67q pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_002 uri=/?q=BENCHMARK%281000000%2CMD5%28%27test%27%29%29 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
